resend_full_email_uob.subject: UOB Transaction Alert
resend_full_email_uob.html:
Dear Cardholder,
A transaction of SGD 16.23 was made with your UOB Card ending 8909 on 08/02/26 at DIGITALOCEAN.COM. If this transaction is unauthorised, please call our 24/7 Fraud Hotline at 6255 0160.
